articles.title: Covid-19 infection could damage testicles, harm sex drive in men, study shows - AsiaOne
articles.description: Findings by Professor Yuen Kwok-yung and his HKU team show sharp drop in sperm count and serum testosterone of infected hamsters four to seven days after infection.

articles.title: Antibodies induced by mRNA shots improve for months; blood cells damaged by Covid-19 cause blood vessel problems - AsiaOne

articles.author: TAN MING WAI
articles.title: Zii Jia: The real challenge will be Thomas Cup Finals in Bangkok - The Star Online
articles.description: Lee Zii Jia reminded his teammates not to get carried away after leading Malaysia to their maiden Asia Team Championships title with a 3-0 win over Indonesia. The world No. 7 said they must be wary of the bigger challenge that lies ahead in the Bangkok Thomas…
articles.content:

articles.author: Kng Zheng Guan
articles.title: Malaysia overpower Indonesia for Asia crown - New Straits Times
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR: The Malaysian men’s team smashed their way to the Badminton Asia Team Championships title at the Setia City Convention Centre in Shah Alam today.
